title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Standing Valet at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: This handsome valet stand helps you beat the morning rush to get ready by providing a safe, wrinkle-free place to put your clothes the night before. Add style and functionality to your bedroom or walk-in closet with this handy helper. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.
transcripts: The men's Standing Valet by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home will help keep clothing and accessories organized. It was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. There is a place to hang both a suit jacket and pants to help them from creasing and hooks for hanging belts and ties. The magnetic lid and top tray, side compartments, and front drawer provide ample room for storing items such as a wallet, money clip, sun glasses, watch, and cufflings. At the bottom is a shelf for storing shoes. the Hudson standing valet by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
